name: Style
disambiguatingDescription: Is defined by Coupland (2007: 2) as 'ways of speaking that are indexically linked to social groups, times and places'.
description: Is defined by Coupland (2007: 2) as 'ways of speaking that are indexically linked to social groups, times and places'. It is a unifying notion linking sociolinguistics (social style), stylistics (literary style) and forensic linguistics (individual style).
